snippet.title: I Am Cat - Official Launch Trailer | Meta Quest & Steam
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3016840/I_Am_Cat/
Meta: https://vr.meta.me/s/1ODS8PFWrjKj7UX

We are glad to announce that I Am Cat will be available starting from December 5!

Here’s a short overview of what’s new in the game:

New Locations
Beyond Granny’s house, players can now explore expanded locations, including a town map, garage, butcher’s shop, and more. These new areas add even more opportunities for exploration!

New Characters
Get ready to meet new characters, such as a playful dog or butcher. They might be friendly or foes depending on your actions!

New Mechanics
Dive into tons of new mechanics like:
Cutting down trees
Drive a lawn mover and cut the grass
Painting on walls
Shooting a slingshot
New cooking recipes

And so much more! Full of freedom and creativity to your sandbox experience.

New Skins and Shop items
Customize your cat with three new skins, launching alongside the game on December 5. Make your cat unique! New items are also available in the shop!

New Quests
Exciting new quests await you, providing hours of engaging challenges and rewards.

We can’t wait to see how you embrace your inner cat and explore all the new content. See you on December 5!
